original_text: el peso de un líquido incoloro , el peso del líquido vital , del amor como elemento de vida , y de muerte . . .
generated_text:
1. "The weight of a transparent liquid, the weight of vital liquid, of love as an element of life, and of death..."
2. "The beauty of a colorless substance, the beauty of life-giving liquid, of love as a vital force, and of mortality..."
3. "The significance of an invisible fluid, the significance of life-sustaining liquid, of love as a fundamental aspect, and of the cycle of life..."
4. "The power of a colorless essence, the power of life-giving liquid, of love as a transformative force, and of the inevitability of death..."
